org.epics.ioc.pdrv.interfaces
Class Int32InterposeBase

java.lang.Object
  org.epics.ioc.pdrv.interfaces.AbstractInterface
      org.epics.ioc.pdrv.interfaces.AbstractInt32
          org.epics.ioc.pdrv.interfaces.Int32InterposeBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Int32, Interface
public class Int32InterposeBase
extends AbstractInt32

Base class for int32 interpose implementations. It implements all int32 methods by calling the lower level int32 methods.. Thus an interpose implementation only needs to implement methods it wants to modify.

Author:
mrk
